body.raw:
Welcome to the official Statistical documentation! If you need help, you can go to here to learn about every feature in Statistical.

## What is Statistical?

Statistical is a Discord bot for tracking the realtime statistics of your favorite YouTube channels. Everytime a channel's subscriber count updates, you will be one of the first to know that it happened.
